topic.title: Usage Scenarios of Cellular Network
topic.shortdesc: The usages of cellular network vary by the type of the cellular network.

section.p: If you have a public cellular network, you can do the following via the cellular network:

ul.li: Register a remote extension to the PBX
Send notification emails from the PBX

section.p: The private IP is unreachable from Internet, so network traffic from other devices cannot reach the PBX. But the PBX can set network traffic to the Internet.
In this way, you can do the followings via the cellular network:

ul.li: Create a register-based VoIP trunk on the PBX.
Send notification emails from the PBX Trunk
